Posts.Content: Jun 1, 2017 05:57PM Rundmc wrote: I had a mastectomy 1 month ago w reconstruction. I haven't seen oncologist yet due to complications w recon. My bs said I'll most likely be on tamoxifin. Did you get your pathology report when you saw Oncologist? At follow up w bs he just said nodes were clear I didn't get a written report.
Posts.Title: was your stage of cancer noted on your pathology report? melissa233 chipilonadog
